Subject: Wrath and Fury

Unicron: 



The robot could feel someone watching him, and the life force of Unitron and 
and those with him falling.  But he'd already sent him a plan to live on, and 
knew it would work.

His entire body flashed for a second, height increased by several feet and 
colors completely different.  He bursted off at incredible speed for one his 
size at FZ, both fists changing into the shape of barrels, an 
energy-signature seeking missile errupting from both of them at FZ.
